author: Muhammad Zilal (@MuhammadZilal)
content: Mine already on 7th day Unifi down today...they keep saying 'work on progress' and 'somebody will call you'...dang, its 7th day, and nobody is calling me..I need to keep calling them to report every single day...and the same answer I got everytime..'we'll update the report', 'work on progress' and 'somebody will call you'...what choice we have in Malaysia? TPPA might be a good thing..
